root.title: bosphoru ship move istanbul offic close
root.body: istanbul remain virtual standstil today snow meter deep ship move narrow bosphoru waterway link sea marmara black sea offici say author order govern offic close wednesday mani bank busi school stay shut worker struggl keep main road suppli line open citi 6.5 mln peopl second blizzard hit istanbul week stop yesterday afternoon intern airport reopen today two day closur also shut earlier last week
